title: A Deeper Connection with Your Higher Self  (Guided Meditation)
description:
This is an Original 10 minute guided meditation recorded by us.  As the world awakens, may you align your thoughts, your actions, and your intentions with the purest essence of your being.  Let love be your compass, guiding you towards compassion, kindness, and joy.  Embrace the truth that you are a vessel of divine light, here to illuminate the path for yourself and others.  Take a moment to reflect on your dreams, your aspirations, and the miracles that await you.  Visualize yourself stepping into the grand tapestry of your purpose, embracing every step with grace and courage.  Trust in the wisdom of your higher self, for it holds the keys to unlock the infinite possibilities that lie before you.

Today, as you navigate the ebb and flow of life's currents, remember to seek stillness within.  Find solace in the depths of your being, where your intuition whispers ancient truths and your spirit dances to the rhythm of the universe.

A special thank you to all our monthly supporters!  
We appreciate all your support and contribution to allow this channel to continue to share our guided meditations with the world.  Thank you!!!
If you would like to join our monthly supporters, you can do so here:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/greatmeditation/membership

Credits: 
This recording has been produced by and Exclusively owned by us (Great Meditation).
Voice spoken:  Original commentary recorded by us.
Background Image: Original image produced by, and exclusively owned by us.
Background Music:  Exclusively owned and produced by one of our team members.
channelDescription:
Our channel consists of a group of individuals collaborating together to produce our very own Original guided meditations Exclusive to Great Meditation.   Each video on our channel features an Original Recording Written, Spoken, Edited and Produced by us.  All our videos contains their own Original Commentary unique to that specific video, adding value to our listeners, and are transformative in nature leading to the best possible viewer experience.  Our value proposition offered to our listeners comes from our Original Voice Recordings which guides the listener into a peaceful state of meditation.   

The background music we use in our meditations have either been produced by us and exclusively owned by us (Great Meditation) or by one of our individual team members.

All background visuals are original artwork produced by us, or are composed from licensed images that have been transformed by us into an original derivative unique to our channel.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/HK6T685I8gg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: I saw my higher self energy, she is powerful, and she is purple! Full of light for me, she moves a lot too, but I can see her forming so I can see her properly, it is my first time seeing her, so I shivered everywhere when I saw her coming. It was beautiful, I stayed with her for an extra 5 minutes after the video was done. It was beautiful.

I started crying uncontrolably which I've never experienced while meditating before and felt a ton of love and a weird kind of knowing that the struggles in my life right now are going to lead to something good, thank you for this.

i startled bawling uncontrollably tears of happiness. I realized how badly i’ve been treating myself and my higher self doesn’t want that for me. it needs me to unconditionally love myself and celebrate the small wins.
I felt so happy during this. I can't explain it, I was nearly hyperventilating. When I pressed that higher heart button I literally gasped. It feels so good

I just started a daily meditation practice.  I wanted short periods of time so I will stick with it and build from there.  This is perfect and achievable before work.  I love connecting with my source!  Thank you!
